TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 732
TEI.2.document_title: John W. Hall to Stephen F. Austin, 01-30-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 732

div1.p: Sir Mr. McWilliam Directed me to inform you that he wished you to receive a mule and a Horse of His thats in the nabourhood of St Philop at their value I canot Recollect the Person who has them in Possession If you Know nothing of the Sercumstance yourself John McFarlen will inform you I am yours with Respect
